Reviews.Title: No expert/pro help needed
Reviews.Author: Daniel Chereau
Reviews.Content: Before getting the remote, and based on previous reviews, I had the impression that I would need to go to a professional alarm installation store (ie. Best Buy) in order to program it. The remote comes with very easy to follow instructions for the "learning" process. You WILL NEED to know where the physical "valet" button on your car alarm system is. It took me a while to find it, following some cables under the hood/near the fuse box in my car (which I believe is why SOME people might need to get expert help).Once you find the valet button, the process is really simple and straightforward, and you won't need any further tools. The remote controller comes ready to use, with batteries already installed. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jesus A Flores
Reviews.Content: Item is described wrong (For Dodge Viper) but worked flawlessly with my alarm, I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Easy instructions. Work great.
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Easy instructions. Works great on my 10 year-old Viper alarm system. Took about 5 minutes to setup the basic feature.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Work!
Reviews.Author: doobleedoo
Reviews.Content: This is the correct product but for some reason, it won't program to my car.  I have the exact same one (but older) and it will unprogram and reprogram, but this remote won't work at all.  Caution!

Reviews.Title: Great. Does exactly what's needed.
Reviews.Author: UncleT
Reviews.Content: The product is great I just wanted to add the comment that this isn't for the DODGE Viper but for Directed Electronics' Viper Series of car alarm systems. I just used it to replace the old remote on the alarm system in my Toyota Corolla.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for lost unit...
Reviews.Author: Anthony Furdock
Reviews.Content: Not much I can say about it - I had to replace my previous remote and I'm glad they're available. Works just like the old one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect replacement
Reviews.Author: B. Ong
Reviews.Content: My remote died and got this as a replacement. Googled how to sync this with my Civic and had it paired in 2 minutes. It looks and works just like my old remote so I really have no complaints with this thing.

Reviews.Title: 2 button alarm remote
Reviews.Author: Robert Adami Jr.
Reviews.Content: This product was an excellent buy from Amazon.  My original broke at the key ring attachment, so I needed a new one, just got the code off the back and searched it, amazingly found one just like it to replace.  Great product, completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Keish
Reviews.Content: Got exactly wht I ordered. Wasn't easy installation but I paid someone to program it for me. Might order anth one

Reviews.Title: Works great on my old Rattler 300 car alarm!
Reviews.Author: ReachMe
Reviews.Content: Went on line downloaded the instruction fro my alarm and walla....5 minutes later my new alarm remote works like a charm. Works from over 100 feet away! Nice.

Reviews.Title: viper alarm
Reviews.Author: walzon
Reviews.Content: Works great on my older viper alarm problem is when arrived there were no programming instructions had to go online and find them took me awhile annoying.

Reviews.Title: Remote replacement
Reviews.Author: 900 rider
Reviews.Content: This replacement remote works well. Keep in mind it may need to be programed for your vehicle by a profesional. Best buy helped me out.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Seth "HappyAsHell"
Reviews.Content: It works, what else do you need to know. P S. MAKE sure you have the right Viper #.
